scripts.build-all: yarn --cwd lib build && yarn --cwd parcel build && yarn --cwd vite build && yarn --cwd webpack build
scripts.build-parcel: yarn --cwd lib build && yarn --cwd parcel build
scripts.build-vite: yarn --cwd lib build && yarn --cwd vite build
scripts.build-webpack: yarn --cwd lib build && yarn --cwd webpack build
